page.title: 03Scorton,shopping,tourism.
page.content: Most people travel to Garstang or further afield for major purchases but basic shopping can be done in Scorton.The village has a sub_post office and village stores as well as a licensed restaurant and a well_stocked gift shop.Scorton is a popular destination for coach parties on day trips,weekend drivers,touring cyclists and hikers.A large caravan site on the outskirts of the village provides accomadation for visitors. Some residents are employed in the shops and restaurant,others work on nearby farms or in the local market town of Garstang but an increasing number now commute by car to work in Preston,Lancaster,or even Manchester.
